Term.Definition: ETSI TS 126 290 Extended AMR Wideband codec

Term.Name: AC-4 CIP
Term.Definition: AC-4 Channel-based, Immersive and Personalized audio as specified in ETSI TS 103 190-2

Term.Name: DTS-HD Core
Term.Definition: DTS Coherent Acoustics Core substream multichannel audio as specified in ETSI TS 102 114

Term.Name: DTS-HD LBR
Term.Definition: DTS LBR Extension substream multichannel audio as specified in ETSI TS 102 114

Term.Name: DTS-HD Core+Extension Substream
Term.Definition: DTS Core substream plus Extension substream as specified in ETSI TS 102 114

Term.Name: DTS-HD Lossless
Term.Definition: DTS-HD Lossless substream only as specified in ETSI TS 102 114

Term.Name: DTS-UHD Profile 2
Term.Definition: DTS-UHD Profile 2 Immersive audio as specified in ETSI TS 103 491

Term.Name: DTS-UHD Profile 3
Term.Definition: DTS-UHD Profile 3 Personalized and Immersive audio as specified in ETSI TS 103 491
